verbs.description: A former Mauldin High School English teacher [V: would] give very different grades to President Donald Trump and Sen. Lindsey Graham ( or their staffs ) .
[ARG0: A former Mauldin High School English teacher] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: give] [ARG1: very different grades] [ARG2: to President Donald Trump and Sen. Lindsey Graham ( or their staffs )] .
